# BLAS

**Structure**

An enumeration that acts as a namespace for Swift overlays to BLAS.

## Declaration

```swift
struct BLAS
```

## Overview

The [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/BLAS] enumeration provides methods and structures that offer a Swift-friendly API for Basic Linear Algebra Subprograms (BLAS) and Linear Algebra PACKage (LAPACK) operations.

## Setting the BLAS and LAPACK threading model

- **threadingModel**: The BLAS and LAPACK threading model.
- **BLAS.ThreadingModel**: Constants that describe the BLAS and LAPACK threading model.

## Specifying the threading model

- **BLASSetThreading(_:)**: Sets the BLAS and LAPACK threading model.
- **BLASGetThreading()**: Returns the current BLAS and LAPACK threading model.
- **BLAS_THREADING**: Constants that describe the BLAS and LAPACK threading model.
